post_title: Swap my Marquard Pied460F25 for a Willis Port SC350F25?
post_content:
Hey Fellas!  I know a long shot, but want to swap my Marquard (photos below) for a Vic Willis Port SC350F25 hopefully in as near similar condition, let me know if any interest, thanks!  Cliff
